name: @bitcoinerlab/descriptors
description: This library parses and creates Bitcoin Miniscript Descriptors and generates Partially Signed Bitcoin Transactions (PSBTs). It provides PSBT finalizers and signers for single-signature, BIP32 and Hardware Wallets.
author: Jose-Luis Landabaso

scripts.build:fixtures: node test/tools/generateBitcoinCoreFixtures.js -i test/fixtures/descriptor_tests.cpp | npx prettier --parser typescript > test/fixtures/bitcoinCore.ts
scripts.build: npm run build:src && npm run build:test
scripts.lint:
if [ "$ESLINT_USE_FLAT_CONFIG" != false ]; then echo '
⚠️  WARNING: ESLINT_USE_FLAT_CONFIG is not set to "false".
   Editors may show different results than the CLI linter.
   To fix permanently, add this to your ~/.bashrc or ~/.zshrc:

   export ESLINT_USE_FLAT_CONFIG=false
'; fi; ESLINT_USE_FLAT_CONFIG=false eslint --ignore-path .gitignore --ext .ts src/ test/
scripts.test:integration:soft: npm run ensureTester && node test/integration/standardOutputs.js && echo "\n\n" && node test/integration/miniscript.js
scripts.test:integration:deprecated:
npm run ensureTester && node test/integration/standardOutputs-deprecated.js && echo "

" && node test/integration/miniscript-deprecated.js && echo "

" && node test/integration/ledger-deprecated.js
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration:soft
scripts.testledger: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test:integration:ledger
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && echo "\n\n" && npm run test:integration:deprecated && npm run test:integration:ledger
